column1: chatgpt

On June 23, 2013, floodwaters and landslides in the Kedarnath Valley, located in the Indian state of Uttarakhand, led to the deaths of thousands and significant destruction in the region. The disaster was caused by heavy rainfall that resulted in the overflowing of the Mandakini River and subsequent landslides.
A train accident occurred on June 21, 2022, at 10:30 p.m. IST, when 24 cars of a freight train carrying petroleum products derailed near the town of Konaseema, Andhra Pradesh, India.
The Bandra-Worli Sea Link accident was a traffic crash that occurred on January 8, 2016, on the Bandra-Worli Sea Link, Mumbai, resulting in 1 death and 3 injuries.
The Sirsa fire of 20 December 1995 at the D.A.V. College in Sirsa, Haryana, India, was among the most notorious fires in India.
The Bhopal disaster was an industrial accident that occurred just after midnight on 3 December 1984, at a pesticide plant in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India.
The Barabanki bus accident killed 29 people and injured several others on the Lucknow-Barabanki highway near Barabanki, Uttar Pradesh on 28 July 2021 when a double-decker bus collided with a truck.
SS Lakshadweep was an ocean liner launched in 1925 in Mumbai, India, and was lost in 1956 near the Laccadive Sea with significant loss of life.

Air India Flight 182 was a Boeing 747 that crashed into the Atlantic Ocean near Ireland on June 23, 1985, after a bomb exploded on board. All 329 passengers and crew were killed. It was the deadliest aviation disaster involving a Boeing 747 until 1996 and remains the deadliest terrorist attack involving an aircraft in aviation history.

Indian Airlines Flight 605 was a domestic flight from Mumbai to Bengaluru. On February 14, 1990, the Airbus A320 crashed on approach to Bangalore Airport, about 0.7 kilometres from the runway, resulting in the deaths of 92 of the 146 people on board.
Karunagappally is a municipality in Kollam district, Kerala, India. It includes several wards and localities. A major firework disaster occurred in Puttingal Temple near Karunagappally in 2016.

Manju Warrier is an Indian actress and producer known for her work in Malayalam cinema. A recipient of several awards, including the Kerala State Film Awards, she is often referred to as the 'lady superstar' of Malayalam cinema and has been one of the top actresses in Kerala.

Suresh Gopi is an Indian actor and former Member of Parliament in the Rajya Sabha, well-known for his work in Malayalam cinema. With a career spanning over three decades, he is also recognized for his philanthropic efforts and roles in numerous blockbuster films in Kerala.

Prosenjit Chatterjee is an Indian actor and producer known for his work in Bengali cinema. His career has seen significant ups and downs, including early stardom followed by a period of decline and a strong comeback with numerous successful films and awards in the West Bengal film industry.
Priyanka Chopra is an Indian actress and producer. She has received numerous accolades, including a National Film Award and five Filmfare Awards, with nominations for a Primetime Emmy Award.

Aamir Khan is an Indian actor and producer, known for his versatile performances in a range of films from the blockbuster science fiction movie 'PK' to the socially poignant drama 'Taare Zameen Par'. He is considered one of India's most influential and respected actors.

Yash is a Kannada film actor from Karnataka, India, best known for his roles in action films like 'KGF'. He is particularly celebrated for portraying complex characters in high-profile cinematic productions that have had significant cultural impact.
Shankar is an Indian film director and producer known for his work primarily in Tamil cinema. He is the son of popular film producers in Tamil Nadu.
Sreelekha Mitra is an Indian actress from West Bengal. She started her career as a child actress in Bengali television and cinema.

Shah Rukh Khan is an Indian actor, film producer, and television personality based in Mumbai, India. He has received numerous awards, including 14 Filmfare Awards, and has been honored with the Padma Shri by the Government of India.
Swastika Mukherjee is a Bengali actress from Kolkata. She has been nominated multiple times for the Filmfare Awards East for her performances in various critically acclaimed films.

Sivaji Ganesan was an Indian actor, producer, and philanthropist from Tamil Nadu, known for his powerful voice and dramatic skills. Over a career spanning five decades across various Tamil films, he received several awards including the Dadasaheb Phalke Award, a Padma Bhushan, and was also honored with the title of "Nadigar Thilagam" (doyen of actors).

IndiGo is a major Indian airline headquartered in Gurugram, Haryana, near Delhi. It is the largest airline in India by passengers carried and fleet size, with a dominant market share in the Indian aviation sector.

Air India, the flag carrier of India, is headquartered at Airlines House in New Delhi. The airline operates a widespread network, flying to over 100 international destinations across Asia, Europe, the Americas, and Australia from its primary hub at Indira Gandhi International Airport, utilizing a fleet of over 125 aircraft.

SpiceJet is an Indian airline headquartered in Gurgaon, Haryana, with its primary hubs at Indira Gandhi International Airport in Delhi and Rajiv Gandhi International Airport in Hyderabad. SpiceJet's main office is located in Global Business Park in Gurgaon. It serves a network of regional and short to medium-haul international destinations primarily in Asia.

IndiGo is a major Indian low-cost airline headquartered in Gurugram, Haryana, in the Delhi metropolitan area. IndiGo operates scheduled flights throughout India and to various international destinations in Asia and the Middle East.

Air India is one of the major airlines of India and a legacy carrier headquartered in New Delhi, close to Gurugram. As the oldest operating airline in India, Air India, along with its subsidiaries like Air India Express, operates numerous flights daily and serves destinations across various countries in Asia, Europe, and North America.

SpiceJet is an Indian airline headquartered in Gurugram, Haryana. It operates both scheduled passenger and freight services, covering destinations across India and select international locations in Asia and the Middle East.
Air India is the flag carrier of India and the largest airline by fleet size, international flights, and international destinations in India and South Asia.

Air India Limited is a major Indian airline headquartered at Indira Gandhi International Airport in New Delhi, India. Air India operates a broad domestic and international route network spanning across India and all continents from its primary hub at Delhi, with significant flight operations from Mumbai and international traffic from Delhi.

AirAsia India is an Indian low-cost airline headquartered in Bengaluru, Karnataka. It operates a network of domestic routes as part of the larger AirAsia group, focusing on budget-friendly travel and is recognized as a significant player in the Indian aviation sector.

IndiGo is an Indian low-cost airline headquartered at Indira Gandhi International Airport in New Delhi, India. It operates domestic and international scheduled services on numerous routes across Asia and a few destinations in Europe, serving as the largest airline in India by passengers carried and fleet size.

Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, also known as Mumbai Airport, is the second busiest international airport serving Mumbai, India. It is located in Andheri, Mumbai, about 19 miles north of downtown Mumbai.

Jakkur Aerodrome is a general aviation airport predominantly used for light aircraft and located in Jakkur, north of Bangalore in Karnataka. It also accommodates flying training schools and occasional commercial services.

Cochin International Airport is Kerala's primary international airport. It is located in the district of Ernakulam, about 25 kilometres northeast of Kochi and serves as a major gateway for both domestic and international flights.

The Bangalore Airport City is an entertainment and retail hub located adjacent to Kempegowda International Airport in Bengaluru, India. The complex is designed to provide a mixed-use development with shopping, dining, and green spaces.
Veer Savarkar International Airport, also known unofficially as Port Blair Airport, is the primary international airport serving Port Blair, the capital of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, India.

Tezpur Air Force Station is an airbase located near Tezpur in the state of Assam, India. Currently, it houses the Indian Air Force's Eastern Air Command units and is pivotal for maintaining aircraft used for both training and operational purposes.

Swami Vivekananda Airport is a public airport located in the city of Raipur, Chhattisgarh, India. It is the primary airport serving the Raipur area and is one of the main airports in the state of Chhattisgarh.

Kempegowda International Airport is an airport serving Bengaluru, the capital city of Karnataka, India. Prior to its opening in 2008, the HAL Airport was Bengaluru's primary airport for both international and domestic traffic, but now Kempegowda International handles all commercial air traffic for the city.

Lokpriya Gopinath Bordoloi International Airport, also known simply as Guwahati Airport, is the primary international airport serving Guwahati, Assam. Opened in the late 20th century, it is located at Borjhar, 20 km (12 mi) west of Guwahati city and is named after Gopinath Bordoloi, a freedom fighter and the first Chief Minister of Assam.

Devi Ahilyabai Holkar Airport is a major airport serving Indore, located about 8 kilometers from the city center in Madhya Pradesh, India. It is named after the Maratha queen Devi Ahilyabai Holkar of the Holkar dynasty.
Queens Land is a theme park located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is one of the popular theme parks in the region, featuring over 30 rides including roller coasters, water rides, and a wave pool.

Adlabs Imagica is an entertainment resort located near Khopoli, India, about 74 kilometres from Mumbai. It includes a theme park, a water park, and a themed hotel, offering various attractions and rides that cater to families and tourists.

EsselWorld is a large amusement park located in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It is one of India's oldest and largest amusement parks and features a variety of rides, including the high-speed roller coaster "Shot-N-Drop."

Imagicaa is an amusement park located near Khopoli, Maharashtra, that opened on April 18, 2013. It is one of the largest theme parks in India, featuring a wide range of rides and attractions, including a water park and a snow park.

Ramoji Film City in Hyderabad, India, is a comprehensive recreational area that includes an amusement park component with attractions based on cinematic themes. It opened on 1991, and the park's design includes fantastical architecture and various thematic entertainments that mirror elements from cinema, broadly reflecting the enchantment similar to fairy tales and folklore.

Betaab Valley Adventure Park, located near Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir, offers outdoor recreation and theme park attractions. Although smaller and more focused on natural and adventure activities, it provides visitors with a scenic backdrop akin to Mount Fuji, being situated in the picturesque Betaab Valley.

Funtasia Island is the first water park in Patna, Bihar, offering a range of water-based attractions and pools. It serves as a recreational spot for families and individuals seeking relief from the heat, much like Typhoon Texas in its locales.

Mysore Zoo is a renowned wildlife park in Mysore, India. It features over 40 species, including a range of mammals, birds, and reptiles, catering to a diverse audience comprising families, children, and wildlife enthusiasts who enjoy immersive experiences in a natural setting.

Wonderla is a popular amusement park located in several cities across India, including Bangalore. It is designed for children, teenagers, and adults alike. Wonderla includes not only a variety of thrilling rides and attractions but also houses a water park, providing a comprehensive amusement experience over extensive acreage.
